about_the_game:
This is a virtual reality game with the theme of pandas. Players can wear VR helmets and experience the feeling of visiting a panda and other animals.



In the game, players will be in a cute panda island, which can freely explore all corners of the island and enjoy the natural scenery and various wonderful animals on the island.



There are not only cute pandas on the island, but also rich types of animals such as elephants, giraffes, and lions. Each animal has its own unique habits and behaviors, allowing players to appreciate the interaction between different animals in the game and the interaction between different animals The beauty of ecology. In the game, players can use the controller in their hands to control their actions, move and turn around at will, and observe the surrounding scene.
At the same time, players can interact with the surrounding animals through the controller. At the same time, the game also has beautiful background music and delicate picture effects, allowing players to enjoy the beauty of nature and animals in the game.



This game not only has extremely high fun and entertainment, but also allows players to better understand and protect the natural environment and animal ecology. It is a virtual reality game worth trying.

Operation method:

Move left, left and right before the control of the handle of the handle,
Select the right handle cursor
Right handle trigger key attack.

name: VR World of Pandas

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G4560 / AMD FX 8300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
  • VR Support: SteamVR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 or higher
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio

short_description: This is a virtual reality game with the theme of pandas. Players can wear VR helmets and experience the feeling of visiting a panda and other animals.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Turkish, Japanese, Polish, Thai, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal, Arabic, Korean
